patterns: What medicines can I buy to help me with my common cold?
tell me some prevention method from common cold
What should I eat or drink if i am suffering from common cold?
How can I keep from getting a cold or the flu?
responses:
Medicines you can consume : Dextromethorphan,Decongestant,Diphenhydramine,Crocin Cold & Flu Max.

Preventions that you must follow :Wash your hands,Avoid touching your face,Clean frequently used surfaces,Use hand sanitizers.

Suggested food are : Garlic,Vitamin C–containing fruits,Leafy greens,Broccoli,Oatmeal,Spices,Chicken Soup

patterns: What medicines can I buy to help me with my fever?
tell me some prevention method from fever
What should I eat or drink if i am suffering from fever?
How can I keep from getting a fever?
responses:
Medicines you can consume : acetaminophen ,ibuprofen,aspirin,Crocin Cold & Flu Max.

Prevention that you must follow :Wash your hands,Cover your mouth when you cough and your nose when you sneeze,Clean frequently used surfaces,Avoid sharing cups, glasses, and eating utensils with other people.

Suggested food are : Garlic,Vitamin C–containing fruits,Leafy greens,Broccoli,Oatmeal,Spices,Chicken Soup

patterns: What medicines can I buy to help me with my heart problem?
tell me some prevention method from heart problem
What should I eat or drink if i am suffering from heart problem?
How can I prevent myself from having a heart problem?
responses:
Medicines you can consume : dilzem,deplatt CV, Atorva, Apigut.

Prevention that you must follow :Eat low fat food,Eat less oily food, Do some cardiovascular exercises daily and stay under doctor's regular supervision,quitting smoking, and limiting alcohol intake.

Suggested food are : Fruits and vegetables,nuts and seeds,plant-based oils, such as olive oil,lean meats

patterns: What medicines can I buy to help me with my gastric pain?
tell me some prevention method from gastric pain
What should I eat or drink if i am suffering from gastrcic problem?
responses:
Medicines you can consume : Omeprazole, pantoprazole and lansoprazole.

Prevention that you must follow :Eat high fiber diet and low on oil food, perform some yoga which aids in digestion, drink warm cumin water in the morning to enhance enzymic activity.

Suggested food are : Dietary fiber. This includes oats, legumes, flax seeds, nuts, oranges, apples, and carrots, Vitamin A rich foods. Foods like broccoli, sweet potatoes, kale, spinach, and collard greens contain vitamin A.

patterns: What medicines can I buy to help me with my urological problem?

responses:
Medicines you can consume : antibiotics, penicillin, Nitrofurantoin (Macrobid), Trimethoprim-sulfamethoxazole (Bactrim), Fosfomycin (Monurol).

Prevention that you must follow :Drink plenty of water, and relieve yourself often.

Suggested food are : Dietary fiber. This includes oats, legumes, flax seeds, nuts, oranges, apples, and carrots, Vitamin A rich foods. Foods like broccoli, sweet potatoes, kale, spinach, and collard greens contain vitamin A.

patterns: What medicines can I buy to help me with my diabetes?
tell me some prevention method from diabetes
What should I eat or drink if i am suffering from diabetes?
How can I keep from getting diabetes?
responses:
Medicines you can consume : Insulin ,Amylinomimetic drug,Dipeptidyl peptidase-4 (DPP-4) inhibitor.

Prevention that you must follow :Cut Sugar and Refined Carbs From Your Diet,Work Out Regularly,Drink Water as Your Primary Beverage,Lose Weight If You’re Overweight or Obese,Quit Smoking, Follow a Very-Low-Carb Diet,Watch Portion Sizes.

Suggested food are : Leafy greens,Avocados,Eggs
